participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Goal-oriented and adventurous with a love for the outdoors.
participant_1.background: I m saving for college. I like to surf every chance i get. My favorite actor is robert deniro. I love the snow. I work graveyard in a hotel.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Spontaneous and free-spirited, always looking for the next adventure.
participant_2.background: I am a true believer in god first. I am a carefree , funloving , free spirited person. I love adventure that is why i have been a sales person all my life. I am 5 3 an love movie time. I am a fitness guru.

content.text: I'm a sales person too! I'm currently working at a hotel.
That's so cool! I've always loved adventure, so sales was a natural fit for me.
Me too! I love surfing and skiing, but I don't get to do it as much as I would like.
I know what you mean. I love being outdoors, but I don't always have the time.
I'm saving up for college right now. I want to be a teacher.
That's great! I'm sure you'll make a great teacher.
Me too! It's such a good movie.
I'm a big fan of Robert DeNiro. He's my favorite actor.
He's a great actor! I love his movies.
I'm glad you're so easy to talk to!
